snippet: Wilbur L. Ross Jr. provided some indication of the future of his firm in a letter to investors on Wednesday, but as is the case with many aging business titans, the line of succession has been a looming question, Julie Creswell reports in The New...
abstract: Wilbur L. Ross Jr. provided some indication of the future of his firm in a letter to investors on Wednesday, but as is the case with many aging business titans, the line of succession has been a looming question, Julie Creswell reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Turnaround King Tries to Convince Investors He Hasn't Lost a Step
